column1: Noor is making coffee at a busy shop. Noor wants to make a yummy coffee with oat milk for a person. Noor picks a milk jar and puts oat milk in it. Noor wants to make coffee with almond milk. Noor makes the coffee with the milk in the jar.

Zara is attending an art exhibition at a local gallery in her town. Zara wants to learn more about a particular abstract painting she admires. The label next to the artwork states that the painting is the work of a famous artist
column2: and Zara reads the label carefully. A gallery visitor accidentally spills a glass of water near the painting. Zara looks for more information about the famous artist.

column1: Carlos is a farmer in a little place
column2: watching his corn field. He wants to give water to his plants by opening a water door connected to a river nearby. Carlos closed the water door last night. A group of big birds comes to the corn field. Carlos phones his friend to ask if they can open the water door.

column1: Harry is in his home on a cold day. Harry wants to make his home warm with a fire in the fireplace. Harry sees the fireplace is full of wood ready for a fire. A bird flies into Harry's window. Harry plans to light the fire in the fireplace.

Emily is on a popular island for a fun day. Emily wants to tie her boat to a big tree near the beach. Emily sees the tree is strong and big. A big fish jumps out of the water near Emily's boat. Emily starts to tie her boat to the tree.

Lisa is at a big party with her friends. Lisa wants to play a song on her violin for her friends. Lisa's violin is in a clean and shiny case. A clown comes to the party and starts to make balloon animals. Lisa opens the case and starts to play her violin.

Billy is playing in his room with his toy cars. Billy wants to play a game where his toy gun is the start line for the cars. Billy's toy gun is standing up straight on the floor. Billy's mom calls him for lunch. Billy sits down on the floor and starts the car race.
Gina is in her garden with her white ball. Gina wants to play catch with her dog. Gina's ball is clean and white. A butterfly lands on Gina's hand. Gina plans to throw the ball for her dog to catch.
Dino is at a big party with his friends. Dino wants to share a big
column2: thin cake with his friends. The cake is on a high table. A big balloon pops and makes a loud noise. Dino takes the cake from the table to share with his friends.

column1: Wanda is in her room with her big book. Wanda wants to put a pretty stamp on a page to mark her favorite story. Wanda's stamp is new and sticky. Wanda's cat jumps onto her bed. Wanda plans to put the stamp on her book page.

Felix is at a big car race. Felix wants to unlock his race car and start the motor to join the race. Felix sees that his car keys are in his pocket. A graceful bird lands on the fence near the race track. Felix takes the keys out of his pocket to unlock his car.

Violet is in a beautiful garden full of flowers. Violet wants to take a picture of a big red rose. The rose is in full bloom and it looks very pretty. A butterfly lands on a nearby sunflower. Violet takes a picture of the blooming rose.

Kyle is in the park with his red kite. Kyle wants to fly his kite in the sky. Kyle sees that his kite is dry and ready to fly. A little bird lands on a tree near Kyle. Kyle wants to run and let his kite fly in the sky.

Alice is at a fun park with her red ball. Alice wants to play catch with her friends using her red ball. Alice sees that her red ball is in her bag. A merry-go-round starts to play a happy song. Alice takes the ball from her bag to play catch with her friends.

column2: building a big sand castle. Oliver wants to make the tallest sand castle that he can. Oliver's sand castle is very tall and strong. A seagull lands near Oliver's sand castle spot. Oliver plans to add more sand to make his castle taller.
